name: Bulbo and the Lizard-King
overview: Bulbo and the Lizard King is a Text-Adventure, made as a parody of Tolkien's works. The player is "Bulbo" who must defeat the evil lizard king "Stratos". It is part of "the Balrogian Trilogy" together with An Everyday Tale of a Seeker of Gold and Fuddo and Slam. It is also a prequel of Retarded Creatures and Caverns. The game was designed by John Wilson.
